title: Here’s why Kylie Jenner skipped this year’s Emmys
text:
From Cosmopolitan

You’d think that anyone who’s anyone would be at the Emmys last night. But alas, there was one big showbiz name that wasn’t in attendance, and that’s Kylie Jenner.

Kylie’s sisters Kim Kardashian and Kendall Jenner were there to present the award for Outstanding Reality TV. Kylie was supposed to be joining them, but sadly, according to People magazine, she had to stay home as she was ill.

But maybe she could see into the future and predict that her sisters would get laughed at during their time on stage, and decided she’s didn’t want any part of that.

Photo credit: Getty Images More

When Kim said: “Our family knows first hand how truly compelling television comes from real people just being themselves, telling their stories, unfiltered and unscripted,” laughter erupted from the audience. Harsh.

But that didn’t put them off, and they continued presenting.

Kim and Kendall just got laughed at mid-intro... pic.twitter.com/e0MjUo21Ix — Scott Feinberg (@ScottFeinberg) September 23, 2019

Kendall’s outfit also got a lot of attention, and she chose to wear a PVC polo neck dress, and you know that’s asking for perspiration.

And if you were wondering where Khloe Kardashian was, well she was at home tweeting their new series of Keeping Up With The Kardashians. She posted a tweet saying, “I’m here lol”.

You Might Also Like
description: It would have been good for Kim Kardashian and Kendall Jenner to have her support, tbh…
